#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

#define sc1(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sc2(x,y) scanf("%d%d",&x,&y)
#define sc3(x,y,z) scanf("%d%d%d",&x,&y,&z)

#define sc1l(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define sc12(x,y) scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y)
#define sc13(x,y,z) scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&x,&y,&Z)

#define pr1(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pr2(x,y) printf("%d %d\n",x,y)
#define pr3(x,y,z) printf("%d %d %d\n"x,y,z)

#define prl1(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define prl2(x,y) printf("%lld %lld\n",x,y)
#define prl3(x) printf("%lld %lld %lld\n",x,y,z)
int main()
{
    int n;
    sc1(n);
    cin.ignore();
    while(n--)
    {
        int i;
        string arr;
        char c;
        getline(cin,arr);
        int len,k=0;
        len=arr.size();
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i]==90)
            {
                cout<<"A";
            }
            else
             if(arr[i]==122)
            {
               cout<<"a";
            }
            else
            if((arr[i]>=65&&arr[i]<90)||(arr[i]>=97&&arr[i]<122))
            {
                arr[i]=arr[i]+1;
                cout<<arr[i];
            }
            else
            {
                continue;
            }

        }
        cout<<"\n";


    }
    return 0;
}
